parameters.name: MirrorPlane
parameters.description: Reference plane or planar face about which to mirror the components

parameters.name: ComponentsToInstance
parameters.description: Array of seed components with which to create copy mirror components

parameters.name: ComponentOrientations
parameters.description: Array of swMirrorComponentOrientation_e values; valid only if ComponentsToInstance is not null

parameters.name: OrientAboutCenterOfMass
parameters.description: True to orient the mirror components about the center of mass, false to orient them about the bounding box center

parameters.name: ComponentsToMirror
parameters.description: Array of seed components with which to create opposite-hand mirror components

parameters.name: CreateDerivedConfigurations
parameters.description: True to create a derived configuration of the mirror components in the original assembly, false to create new part files; valid only if ComponentsToMirror and MirroredComponentFilenames are not null and NameModifierType is swMirrorComponentNameModifier_e .swMirrorComponentName_Custom

parameters.name: MirroredComponentFilenames
parameters.description: Array of mirror part file names whose names can be further modified by the settings of NameModifierType and NameModifier; if CreateDerivedConfigurations is true, then this array contains the names for the new configurations and NameModifierType must be swMirrorComponentNameModifier_e.swMirrorComponentName_Custom; valid only if ComponentsToMirror is not null

parameters.name: NameModifierType
parameters.description: Mirror part file name modifier type as defined in swMirrorComponentNameModifier_e; valid only if ComponentsToMirror and MirroredComponentFilenames are not null

parameters.name: NameModifier
parameters.description: Prefix or suffix to apply to file names of mirror parts; valid only if NameModifierType is swMirrorComponentNameModifier_e.swMirrorComponentName_Prefix or swMirrorComponentNameModifier_e.swMirrorComponentName_Suffix and ComponentsToMirror and if MirroredComponentFilenames are not null

parameters.name: MirroredComponentFileLocation
parameters.description: Folder where to save the mirror parts; valid only if CreateDerivedConfigurations is false

parameters.name: ImportOptions
parameters.description: Mirror transfer options as defined in swMirrorPartOptions_e

parameters.name: BreakLinks
parameters.description: True to break the links between the mirror parts and the original parts, false to keep the links

parameters.name: PreserveZAxis
parameters.description: True to mirror the Z-axis orientation in the mirror part, false to flip the Z-axis orientation in the mirror part

,

MirroredComponentFileLocation
,

ImportOptions
,

BreakLinks
,

PreserveZAxis
